biotools.summary:
Arabidopsis Hormone Database 2.0 is an update version of AHD. You can find useful information on eight major phytohormones: abscisic acid, auxin, brassinosteroid, cytokinin, ethylene, gibberellin, jasmonic acid and salicylic acid. 
It has a collective of genes with information based on various studies; genetics relationship of these genes; miRNA predictions; expression signatures.

bioschemas.name: Arabidopsis Hormone Database 2.0 (AHD2.0)
